featured.text: With the completion of several public ______ projects, such as the MRT, commuting to work has become easier for people living in the suburbs.

definition.zh_def: 通勤，指從家到工作地點之間的日常旅行。
definition.en_def: To travel regularly to and from a place, especially to work or school.
definition.example: I commute to the city every day by train.
